title: Klassis Turkish Open
text: The Klassis Turkish Open was a <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament on the <a href="Challenge%20Tour">Challenge Tour</a>, held in <a href="Turkey">Turkey</a>. First played in 1997 when <a href="Bradley%20Dredge">Bradley Dredge</a> triumphed over <a href="Magnus%20Persson%20Atlevi">Magnus Persson Atlevi</a>, it was discontinued after the 1998 edition. The Challenge Tour returned to Turkey in 2010 for the <a href="Turkish%20Challenge">Turkish Challenge</a>.
